p: Lipid oxidation was evaluated by the p‐Anisidine value ( p‐AV, unidimensional) that measures secondary oxidation products, namely unsaturated aldehydes as 2–alkenals and 2,4–dienals, performed under ISO 6885: 2006 (2006). Additionally, the total polar compounds (TPC) were quantified by size exclusion chromatography, including oxidized triglycerides (OTG) dimeric and polymeric triglycerides (DPTG), and free fatty acids (FFA), following Dobarganes, Velasco, and Dieffenbacher ( 2000).
